articles.author: Hamilton Nolan
articles.title: Elon Musk won’t fight Mark Zuckerberg in a ‘cage match’ – because he knows he’d lose - The Guardian
articles.description: America’s richest and most cowardly man, Musk, proposed an idiotic fight, then came up with every excuse not to really do it
articles.content: Never challenge anyone to a fight. Not even if you think you would win. Especially not if you think you would win. To break this commandment is to invite the wrath of all universal karma down upon yo… [+5417 chars]
